channel.title: [317][Soul Pkerz][Delta Source]How do I make hiddens lose items on death?
channel.description:
On my server, it is almost impossible for hidden administrators to PK and remain hidden because they don't lose their items on death.
How can I make it so that they lose items as if they were regular players?
Thanks,
d.v.c[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 05, 2009, 10:22:02 am[/size][hr]bump
